modifier.name: Arc
modifier.summary: * Triangle shaped effect starting at 3 spaces wide and widening by 1 additional space for each space of range. * [-2 Skill] for each Space of Range

modifier.name: Armor-Piercing (AP)
modifier.summary: * Specifically designed to target armored units.

modifier.name: Anti-Armor
modifier.summary: * Specifically designed to tear apart armor to leave target open to further attacks.

modifier.name: Anti-Missile
modifier.summary: * Specifically designed to intercept high speed targets moving in a straight line.

modifier.name: Anti-Personnel
modifier.summary: * Specifically designed to attack man-sized targets.

modifier.name: Anti-Shield
modifier.summary: * Specifically designed to reduced [Shielding].

modifier.name: Aura
modifier.summary: * Radial effect encompassing the current space and continuing for Level Range.

modifier.name: Beam
modifier.summary: * Rectangular shaped effect 1 space wide. * [-1 Skill] for each 2 Spaces of Range

modifier.name: Column
modifier.summary: * Rectangular shaped effect starting at 1 space wide and widening to 3 spaces. * [Action]: [-2 Skill] for each Space of Range

modifier.name: Cone
modifier.summary: * Triangle shaped effect starting at 1 space wide and widening by 1 additional space for every 2 spaces of range. * [Action]: [-2 Skill] for each Space of Range

modifier.name: Haywire
modifier.summary: * Attack that damages electrical systems.

modifier.name: Hidden Effect
modifier.summary: Effect cannot be detected through normal means.

modifier.name: High-Explosive (HE)
modifier.summary:
* [Targetting]: Target a space. All units in that space and surrounding spaces are attacked. * [Damage]: All target's are [+2 Armor] against this attack. * [Damage]: Units surrounding the space are attacked at -1 Damage for each space distant.
Advanced: * Instead of standard [High Explosive (HE)] rules the following may be used to more accurately simulate the damage exponential decrease in energy of explosives. * [Targetting]: Target a space. All units in that space and surrounding spaces are attacked. * [Damage]: All target's are [+2 Armor] against this attack. * [Damage]: Units surrounding the space are attacked by dividing the energy (in Joules, or tons of TNT) using the following reduction pattern for each space distant: 1/1, 1/3, 1/10, 1/30, 1/100, 1/300, 1/1000, etc. Then look up the new damage based on the new energy level.

modifier.name: Indirect
modifier.summary: * May use [Indirect Fire] ability to attack without [Line of Sight].

modifier.name: Pushing the Limits
modifier.summary: Powers may be increased temporarily, but this runs a risk of damaging or permanently altering the subject or his powers in some way. This may even increase the power but may create [Aberrations].

modifier.name: Sphere
modifier.summary: * Radial effect encompassing the current space. * [Action]: [-3 Skill] for each Space of Range

modifier.name: Touch
modifier.summary: * [Requires]: Target must be within 1 space and be able to be touched.

modifier.name: Wall
modifier.summary: * Walls start on the edge of a space and spread outward one space in each direction on each of this unit's turns until the unit ceases concentration or the maximum size is reached. Maximum Size is one square space per level.

modifier.name: Activation
modifier.summary: * Activating the ability requires more than just desire

modifier.name: Always On
modifier.summary: * Ability may not be turned off

modifier.name: Annoying
modifier.summary: * Tiny things that make using the ability frustrating.

modifier.name: Conditional Use
modifier.summary: * Ability may only be used under specific circumstances

modifier.name: Energy Discharge
modifier.summary: Cannot completely contain own energies and must allow them to leak out regularly. At low levels this just draws attention, but at higher levels becomes dangerous.

modifier.name: Inefficient
modifier.summary: * Uses excessive energy.

modifier.name: Power Fluxuation
modifier.summary: Cannot completely control power level. At random, power use may be higher or lower than expected. High level powers may not be able to be turned off or may not turn on when needed.

modifier.name: Power Hungry
modifier.summary: * Requires extra turns of inactivity to use.

modifier.name: Power Manifestation
modifier.summary: When powers are used, a visual or audible manifestation appears. The higher the power level the more obvious the manifestation.

modifier.name: Sensor Dependent
modifier.summary: * Blind without Sensors

power.name: Quality Item
power.summary: * An item with this skill is of particularly high quality and possesses unusual abilities. * The level of quality effects the number of abilities as usual. * Each level of quality doubles the original price of the item.

ability.name: Fine Workmanship
ability.summary: * This item possesses fine details that are particularly attractive to collectors.

ability.name: High Durability
ability.summary: * This item is exceptionally well constructed and can withstand a suprising amount of punishment compared to a normal item of its type.

power.name: Quality Weapon
power.summary: * A weapon with this skill is of particularly high quality and possesses unusual abilities. * The level of quality effects the number of abilities as usual. * Each level of quality doubles the original price of the item.

section.name: Vehicular Systems
section.summary:
** Atmospheric Engine ** Sub-light Drive ** FTL Drive
* Science Lab w/Sensors * Air Locks ** Magnetic Mooring Lines ** Vacc Suits * Weapons Locker * Drop Chamber w/Drop Pods * Cloaking Device * Shields

section.name: Weapon Bay
section.summary: * Main Turrets * Point Defense ** Antiaircraft * Grenade Launcher * Laser * Mass Driver * Missiles ** Micro-missiles ** Mini-missiles ** Heavy missiles * Particle Beam * Plasma Lance * Spinfuser * Taser * Payloads ** Acid ** Antimatter ** Bioweaponry ** Chemical ** Explosive ** Fusion ** Incendiary ** Nuclear ** Nuclear Waste * Missile Bay * Torpedo Bay ** Nuclear ** Fusion ** Antimatter ** Planet Buster

power.name: Hanger
power.summary: * A special ability of vehicles to carry other vehicles. * A unit may carry 1 small unit (1 space) per space it takes up. * Action: Move 1 unit into or out of the hanger. The unit may not Move or take any Action the turn it moves into or out of the hanger. * Ship's Boat * Air Raft * Starfighter * Starbomber * Repair Drones * Mobile Armor

power.name: Mission Section
power.summary: * Determine the total hull size and then divide it as desired by the following abilities.

specialty.name: Battleship
specialty.summary: * A large (3 space) ship dedicated to being a battleship may carry a Spinal Mount weapon. * Spinal Mount

specialty.name: Heavy Carrier
specialty.summary: * A large (3 space) ship dedicated to being a carrier can carry 1 extra unit (4 units) in its Hanger. * Hanger * Launch Catapult

specialty.name: Search and Rescue Vessel
specialty.summary: * Wide array of sensors * Multipurpse rescue vehicles * Heavy construction equipment * Emergency medical facilities * Space for evacuation and emergency supplies

ability.name: Cryogenic Chamber
ability.summary: * Special ability of space craft to carry passengers in cryonic suspension.

ability.name: Diving Wings
ability.summary: +1 when pulling out of a dive

ability.name: Glider
ability.summary: * Can glide without using power and may gain altitude when flying over hot air currents.

ability.name: Gun Ports
ability.summary: Allows crew to use small arms fire without sacrificing armor protection.

ability.name: Launch Catapult
ability.summary: * Launching vehicle may begin move at up to full speed without using fuel.

ability.name: Living Quarters
ability.summary: * Long range and luxury vessels offer more than the minimum crew quarters. This includes private rooms, mess, recreation areas, etc. * The larger the living space, the higher quality clientele may be brought aboard and the longer the ships range before shore leave is needed. * Includes Mess and Lounges

ability.name: Storm Chamber
ability.summary: Specially shielded chamber designed to be a safe room for particularly dangerous events including radiation flares and decompression.

ability.name: Tanker Hold
ability.summary: The hold is equipped to hold large amounts of liquids or gases at appropriate environments. This can be used for long range vessels to carry their own fuel or act as a fuel tanker.

ability.name: Haywire Resistance
ability.summary: * Resists the Haywire attack

ability.name: Quantum Entanglement Comm
ability.summary: * A technique used to transfer quantum information from one quantum system to another over vast distances.

ability.name: Damage Control Team
ability.summary: A crack team conducts emergency repairs. * [Action]: Roll vs. [Damage]. Each [Hit] removes a [White Token]. Each [Critical Hit] removes a [Black Token]. These repairs last until the end of the battle.

ability.name: Fusion Engine
ability.summary: * 'rockets point down' principle * Everything has a price. And the price of powerful rockets with nuclear propulsion is of course the dread horror of deadly atomic radiation. But the danger can be brought under control with appropriate counter-measures, and by treating the power plant with the respect it deserves. And the same measures will come in handy if your ship may be facing hostile nuclear warheads.

ability.name: Geared for Endurance
ability.summary: * Vehicle is designed for Endurance and can travel unusually long distances without resupply and is exceptionally rugged.

ability.name: Geared for Power
ability.summary: * Vehicle is designed for Power and can tow, lift, or push 50% more load than usual.

ability.name: Geared for Speed
ability.summary: * Vehicle is designed for Speed and can accelerate faster and can temporarily exceed normal speed rating.

ability.name: Red Line
ability.summary: * Engineering can push any of the ships' systems for extra performance, but run the risk of significant damage. * [Action]: Roll vs. the target system. Any [Hits] increase that system by 1 for [Hits] turns. Each [Critical Hit] increases that system by a further 1. Negative [Hits] reduce that system by the [Hits] for [Hits] turns. For each system [Critical Hit], the system takes a [System Damage Token].

power.name: Laboratory
power.summary: Special labs for analyzing information. Science labs are very flexible and can be used for any number of quick analytics. Obviously, they are severly limited compared to proper research facilities.

ability.name: Storm Cellar
ability.summary: * The crew will occupy the cellar when the sun kicks up a solar storm of radiation. As these can last for days, one had better include a few crew-days worth of food, water, and tranquilizers. If you are relying upon algae for your oxygen, it deserves space in the storm cellar as well. This probably also applies to stored food too. Particle radiation can destroy a lot of the vitamins in food. Alas, computers and other digital electronics are also vulnerable to radiation. If there is a critical failure outside, thenit is time to start drawing straws to decide who gets to heroically commit suicide by saving the ship.

ability.name: Airlift Ready
ability.summary: * Ability to be quickly picked up and dropped by [Airlift] vehicles without them landing.

ability.name: Alarm System
ability.summary: * When armed, this defensive system will raise a warning whenever a person gets too close.

ability.name: Anti-Personnel Charges
ability.summary: * When armed, this defensive system will automatically detonate whenever a person gets too close.

ability.name: Catapult Hook
ability.summary: * Can take off and land from carriers and gain the initial speed benefit of carrier catapults.

ability.name: High Mobility
ability.summary: * Vehicles with this ability sacrifice overall speed for rapid turning. Movement systems are divided across the entire vehicle to maximize mobility, but this greatly reduces maximum speed. * -2 Speed, Unit may use Infantry movement rules.

ability.name: Stealth Technology
ability.summary: * Reduces detection by radar, heat and other similar vehicle detection systems.

ability.name: Transformation System
ability.summary: * Transformation allows a unit to switch into a different form. Each form must be designnated at creation time, and each form may have any or all of the units abilities. This is particularly useful for abilities that have penalties (e.g. High Mobility).

ability.name: Vector Movement
ability.summary: * Movement in frictionless environments follow Newton's first law, a object in motion tends to stay in motion. * Units will continue at their current speed. * [Speed] can used to increase or decrease current speed. * [Speed] can also be used to sideslip left or right by 1 space. * Facing can be changed by one side each space moved, but this does not change speed or direction.

ability.name: Cannibal
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Close Combat * [Attack]: Each [Critical Hit] may remove a [Damage Token] from this unit.

ability.name: Mindless
ability.summary: * 0 [Mind] * Cannot use any Mind Abilities * Immune to Abilities that target [Mind].

ability.name: Savage
ability.summary: * Must Attack if able. * Ignores Fear, Despair, and Morale

ability.name: Skeletal
ability.summary: * +1 Body * Ignores [Bleeding], [Poison], and [Disease]

ability.name: Soulless
ability.summary: * A soulless unit is not truly alive. It may not use or gain Spirit skills.

power.name: Mental Weakness
power.summary: * Note: Mental Weaknesses may be physical in nature, but they are grouped here because they effect mental function.

ability.name: Addle Minded
ability.summary: * Tendency to forget to do things or misplace things. The missed things may be trival, important, or critical.

ability.name: Amnesia
ability.reference: * Memento
ability.summary: * Unit has strange lapses of memory. It may forget generally known facts, friends, family, or own identity.

ability.name: Bipolar
ability.summary: * Prone to fits of erratic up moods and severe depression. May be moody, lie around and mope, risk life and limb, or even suicidal.

ability.name: Bloodthirsty
ability.summary: * Must attack Bleeding Enemies first. May attack Bleeding Allies if a Spirit roll fails.

ability.name: Cyberpsychosis
ability.reference: * Something happens when you start to add metal and plastic to people. They start to change. And it isn't pretty - Cyberpunk RPG
ability.summary: * A psychotic aberration suffered by excessive users of cyberware. It begins as a sense of loss for the portions of the body replaced with unfeeling machinery. Later it manifests as a Overconfidence and detachment from other people (sometimes in favor of machines). Extreme cases lead to more serious derangements such as: Martyr Syndrome, Megalomania, Delusions of Grandear, Inferiority Complex, and Messiah Complex.

ability.name: Delusional
ability.reference: * The walls of reality will come crashing down. One minute you'll be the savior of the rebel cause. The next thing you know you'll be Cohagen's busom buddy. You'll even have fantasies of alien civilizations, as you requested, but in the end, back on Earth, you'll be lobotomized! - Dr. Edgemar, Total Recall
ability.summary: * Believe things that are not real. May hear voices or see things.

ability.name: Frightened
ability.summary: * Lacks nerve, especially in combat. May freeze or flee.

ability.name: Masochism
ability.summary: * Dislikes self. Will go out of way to injure oneself. May seek verbal, physical, psychological, or sexual abuse. May seek life threatening abuse.

ability.name: Megalomania
ability.summary: * A specific form of delusion that you are more important than you are. May believe you are destined for greatness, a Messiah, or even God.

ability.name: Multiple Personalities
ability.reference: Sybil
ability.summary: * More than one distinct personality. Personalities may change under stress or randomly. Personalities may like, dislike, or be oblivious to each other. Some may be dangerous to self or others.

ability.name: Obsessed
ability.summary: * Focused on a single person or object and will talk about it all the time. May risk embarrassment, financial loss, or bodily harm to pursue it.

ability.name: Obsessive Compulsive
ability.summary: * Compulsively performs trivial activities.

ability.name: Overcompensating
ability.summary: * Constantly attempt to draw attention away from preceived flaw.

ability.name: Paranoia
ability.reference: Just because you're paranoid doesn't mean they aren't after you. - Catch 22
ability.summary: * Belief that enemies are everywhere. May rant endlessly about the conspiracy, compulsively work on defenses, risk everything to stop them.

ability.name: Phobia
ability.summary: * Unreasoning fear of some common thing. Fear of dogs, heights, sounds, or colors. May feel discomfort, paralyzing fear, beserk fear, or catatonia.

ability.name: Robophobia
ability.reference: * Uncanny Valley - The theory that as a robot is made more humanlike in its appearance and motion, the emotional response from a human being to the robot will become increasingly positive, until a point is reached beyond which the response quickly becomes that of strong revulsion. However, as the appearance and motion continue to become less distinguishable from a human being, the emotional response becomes positive once more. * This area of repulsive response aroused by a robot with appearance and motion between a 'barely human' and 'fully human' entity is called the uncanny valley. The name captures the idea that a robot which is 'almost human' will seem overly strange and corpselike. * Not robots...walking dead. They pretend we control them...but really... - Doctor Who, The Robots of Death * The name 'Grimwade's Syndrome' was an in-joke reference to production assistant Peter Grimwade who had bemoaned the fact that the stories on which he was assigned to work almost always involved robots. - Doctor Who, The Robots of Death
ability.summary: * Fear of Robots

ability.name: Sex Crazed
ability.titles: Cassonova, Heartbreaker, Lady Killer, Libertine, Lothario, Romeo, Sex Addict

ability.name: Shy
ability.summary: * Hate dealing with others. Avoid interactions with new people. May need to retreat from others.

ability.name: Stubborn
ability.summary: * Will not give in or compromise. May risk embarrassment, financial loss, or injury to prove you're right.

ability.name: Tempermental
ability.reference: * What do we have? Sea Bass. Riiiight? They are mutated Sea Bass. Really. Are they ill-tempered. Absolutely. Well that's a start. - Dr. Evil and Number 2 - Austin Powers
ability.summary: * Constantly irritable. When temper flares will risk embarrassment, financial loss, incarceration, or life and limb.

power.name: Physical Weakness
power.titles: Aberrations, Inhumanity, The Price of Power, Taint
power.summary: A being that has a great deal of power becomes increasingly inhuman as power increases. Physical powers become harder to conceal growing increasingly monstrous and mentality leans more toward megalomania, messiah complex, or detached alien.

ability.name: Allergy
ability.summary: Affected by substances or energies that have little or no effect on normal people.

ability.name: Atrophy
ability.summary: * One or more limbs has limited mobility

ability.name: Child
ability.summary: * You are still a child and have difficulty getting others to take you seriously. This is usually taken with [Short].

ability.name: Contagious
ability.summary: Spreads disease.

ability.name: Deformity
ability.summary: * Reduces Social Skills and some Physical Skills.

ability.name: Disfigured
ability.summary: * Reduces Social Skills dramatically.

ability.name: Lame
ability.summary: * Reduces Speed

ability.name: Obvious
ability.summary: * Easy to detect and target

ability.name: Obvious Signature
ability.summary: * Easy to identify and track

ability.name: Short
ability.summary: * This minor weakness reduces vision over objects and movement speed. * It can, however, provide benefits to [Stealth].

ability.name: Sterile
ability.summary: * May not produce offspring

ability.name: Temperature Control Problem
ability.summary: * Cannot regulate temperature correctly

ability.name: Unusual Diet
ability.summary: * Minor: Eat wood, garbage, hair, etc. * Major: Eat metal, energy * Extreme: Eat blood, human flesh, plutonium

ability.name: Unusual Eyes
ability.summary: * Minor: Strange colored * Major: Animal-like, or glowing eyes * Extreme: Bug-eyes, or no eyes

ability.name: Unusual Limbs
ability.summary: Gnarled, segmented, snake-like, eloganted or other bizarre looking limbs

ability.name: Unusual Musculature
ability.summary: Bulging muscles or wasted looking

ability.name: Unusual Skin
ability.summary: * Minor: Strange colored * Major: Furry, Striped, Glowing * Extreme: Translucent, Reptilian, Rock-like, Exoskeleton, Oozing

ability.name: Unusual Vulnerability
ability.reference: Kryptonite, Severe Allergies
ability.summary: * Take damage from things that are not dangerous to ordinary people.

ability.name: Vulnerability
ability.summary: * Take additional damage from certain effects

ability.name: Unnatural Presense
ability.summary: * Subtly disturbing, homely, or too perfect and inspires negative attention from others.

ability.name: Ward
ability.summary: * You are devoted to taking care of another (who happens to get into trouble a lot).

power.name: Domination
power.reference: * We don't need no education. We don't need no thought control. - Pink Floyd, The Wall * He accepted everything. The past was alterable. The past had never been altered. Oceania was at war with Eastasia. Oceania had always been at war with Eastasia. Jones, Aaronson, and Rutherford were guilty of the crimes they were charged with. He had never seen the photograph that disproved their guilt. It had never existed; he had invented it. He remembered remembering contradictory things, but those were false memories, products of self deception. How easy it all was! - 1984 * Every move you make, every vow you break, every smile you fake, every claim you stake, I'll be watching you. Every single day... - Every Breath You Take, The Police * Your face will turn to alabaster. When you find your servant is your master. You'll be wrapped around my finger. - Wrapped around your Finger, The Police * I know this steak doesn't exist. I know that when I put it in my mouth, the Matrix is telling my brain that it is juicy and delicious. After nine years, you know what I realize? Ignorance is bliss. - Cypher, The Matrix

ability.name: Conditioning
ability.reference: Manchurian Candidate
ability.summary: * Low level success creates a confused zombie. * High level success creates fanatical loyalty.

ability.name: Indoctrination
ability.summary: Slowly convert a subject into a willing servant.

ability.name: Induce Delusions
ability.summary: Create paranoid delusions in the target.

ability.name: Private World
ability.summary: Create a specific dream world that the subject believes is real.

ability.name: Suggestion
ability.summary: Change

power.name: Empathy
power.summary: The ability to feel the joys and pains of others

ability.name: Ego Crush
ability.summary: * Reduce the [Spirit] of the target to make them more ... pliable.

ability.name: Empathic Bond
ability.summary: * Create a permanent empathic connection with a single target with an already established deep connection (typically lovers or longtime friends). Each senses the other's strong feelings over any distance. No effort is required to maintain the bond, but only one such bond can be maintained at a time.

ability.name: Empathic Healing
ability.reference: * The Empath - Star Trek
ability.summary: * Feel the pain the target is experiencing. Slowly duplicate all the damage from a target onto yourself and then begin healing. * Continuous. Each turn, duplicate 1 damage or negative condition from the target onto yourself. Once all have been duplicated, instead remove a damage or condition from the target.

ability.name: Empathic Link
ability.summary: * Create an empathic connection with a target. Each senses the other's honest feelings. This ability creates trust if the parties are being honest, or mistrust if the parties are false.

ability.name: Empathic Sense
ability.summary: * Sense nearby sentient creatures by their emotions. A general sense of the emotions can be determined as well.

ability.name: Fear Eater
ability.summary: * Remove a [Fear] from the target and gain [Spirit].

ability.name: Project Pain
ability.titles: Pain Shared is a Pain Doubled
ability.summary: * Relive a past (or current) trauma and project those feelings on a target. If you have more than 1 damage you may move 1 to the target. If you have more than 1 negative condition, you may move 1 negative condition to the target.

ability.name: Share Pain
ability.reference: * Your pain runs deep. ... Share your pain with me... and gain strength from the sharing. - Sybok, Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
ability.summary: * Feel the pain the target is experiencing and create trust through the shared experience.

power.name: Illusion
power.reference: * Fantasy... can only survive with an underlying reality. Reality... is the stillness buried deep beneath the illusion. This is eternity. - Raiden Shogun, Genshin Impact
power.summary: * Illusion is the art of fooling the target into believing in something that is not really there. Illusion is Limited by [Art]. * Illusions ** Alter the perceptions to see and hear things that do not exist. ** Skill roll determines the difficulty to detect the illusion, but even those who detect the illusion cannot see through the illusion including the caster. ** Illusions may be enormous, altering terrain and populating it with any number of creatures. ** Illusions may cover real things, but cannot make them disappear. ** Illusions may not do damage or take damage since they are not really there. ** Note: unliving creatures cannot detect or be influenced by illusions. * Phantasms ** Phantasmal objects appear real, but are only partially real and are destroyed with a single [Damage Token]. ** All [Phantasm]s are moved independently each time the unit Moves. All [Phantasm]s perform the same actions as the unit but no effect. When [Phantasm]s are attacked they take effects normally but are uneffected by effects except [Damage] which immediately destroys them.

ability.name: Conjure Effigy
ability.summary: * Create a phantasmal copy of an object touched. The Effigy appears real in most ways, but does not function as the original and will shatter to dust if force is applied to it.

ability.name: Conjure Phantasmal Force
ability.summary: Conjures a phantasmal minion.

ability.name: Dazzling Beauty
ability.summary: Raises the appearance of the caster.

ability.name: Forgetfulness
ability.summary: * Roll vs. Spirit. Target forgets a specific fact or time period.

ability.name: Hidden Thing
ability.summary: * A Phantasm may be placed on other objects making them partially or completely invisible.

ability.name: Hypnotic Eyes
ability.summary: Criticals: [Fascination]

ability.name: Illusion Shattered
ability.reference: * Raiden Shogun, Genshin Impact

ability.name: Illusionary Meal
ability.summary: * Creates a tasty meal out of other less appetizing things. The meal appears and tastes anyway the user wishes. The meal serves level squared human sized persons. The original ingredients may be unpleasant but cannot be harmful.

ability.name: Illusionary Wall
ability.summary: * Appears to be a real wall of any sort including magical ones, but has no real effect except to obscure or block line of sight.

ability.name: Mental Block
ability.summary: * Roll vs. Spirit. Target becomes confused and forgets how to a chosen power for Hits Turns.

ability.name: Mirage
ability.summary: Also known as Illusionary Terrain.

ability.name: Mirror of the Soul
ability.summary: * A person's true nature can be ascertained by looking in his or her eyes.

ability.name: Mirror Image
ability.summary: * [Mind]: Replace the unit with a [Phantasm] and place 1+Criticals additional [Phantasm]s 1 space from the unit. Secretly mark one of these [Phantasm]s as the unit. When all other Mirror Images are destroyed, replace the final [Phantasm] with the unit.

ability.name: Mistaken Identity
ability.summary: * [Action]: Choose a willing unit of roughly equal size and switch places with that unit. * Range: [Mind]

ability.name: Shattered Image
ability.summary: * [Mind]: Destroy any number of [Illusion]s to cause [Stun] and [Confusion] to targets in the area.

ability.name: Danger Sense
ability.summary: * [Event]: Chance to detect a surprise attack.

ability.name: Deja Vu
ability.summary: * [Event]: Chance to recognize a series of events as if they had happened before. This gives insight into how these events might play out.

ability.name: Insight
ability.summary: * [Action]: Synergy with a [Mind] ability.

ability.name: Instinctive Defense
ability.summary: * [Passive]: Synergy with Defense Rolls.

ability.name: Paranormal Memory
ability.summary: * [Action]: Attempt to remember events that happened in an alternate timeline or universe.

ability.name: Psychometry
ability.summary: Obtain information about an individual by making physical contact with an object that belongs to them. * [Action]: Attempt to remember events associated with an object.

power.name: Mastermind
power.summary: * Attempts to confuse by introducing misleading, paradoxical, or spurious logic into a discussion.

ability.name: Circular Logic
ability.summary: * A seemingly reasonable argument that is in fact based upon dependent information. * Such arguments are logically valid. That is, the conclusion does in fact follow from the premise, since it is already contained in the premise. They do not, however, aid in the proof of the statement or the premise.
ability.reference: * If such actions were not illegal, then they would not be prohibited by the law.

ability.name: Compartmentalize
ability.summary: * Separate a hidden thought process away from the normal mind.

ability.name: Doublethink
ability.summary: * Doublethink is the act of simultaneously holding two mutually contradictory beliefs while fervently fooling oneself into believing both.
ability.reference: * To tell deliberate lies while genuinely believing in them, to forget any fact that has become inconvenient, and then, when it becomes necessary again, to draw it back from oblivion for just so long as it is needed. - 1984 George Orwell

ability.name: Maze of the Mind
ability.summary: * Confuses the target's senses so it cannot accurately choose its direction. This can be extremely hazardous to fast moving units. * [Move]: Whenever the unit moves, its direction is randomized from among its normal movement options (including diving and climbing for air units).

ability.name: Maze Mastery
ability.summary: * The user knows thousands of mazes and can choose an optimal course through any maze with minimal trial and error.

ability.name: Mind Blank
ability.summary: * Hide ones true thoughts. * Makes an excellent poker face. * Full defense against any attempt to detect the unit's mind. * Full defense against any attempt to detect lies.

ability.name: Misinformation
ability.summary: * Spock: Logic is a little tweeting bird chirping in a meadow. Logic is a wreath of pretty flowers which smell BAD. Are you sure your circuits are functioning correctly? Your ears are green. - I, Mudd, Star Trek

ability.name: Rationalize
ability.summary: * Increases resistance to all forms of mental attack by reinterpreting and rationalizing commands to render them meaningless.

ability.name: Simplify, Simplify, Simplify
ability.summary: * Progressively breakdown a problem into simpler problems which can each be resolved separately.

ability.name: Unsolvable Problem
ability.reference: * Kirk: Everything Harry says is a lie. Remember that, Norman. *Everything* he says is a lie. * Mudd: Now I want you to listen to me very carefully, Norman. I'm... lying. * Norman: You say you are lying, but if everything you say is a lie, then you are telling the truth, but you cannot tell the truth because you always lie... illogical! Illogical - I, Mudd, Star Trek
ability.summary: * Fool the target into trying to resolve a problem with no easy solution.

ability.name: False Memories
ability.summary: * Alter the memories of the target.

ability.name: Through the Looking Glass
ability.reference: * I'm sorry to tell you this, but you've suffered a schizoid embolism. We can't snap you out of your fantasy... and I've been sent in to try to talk you down. - Total Recall

ability.name: Twisted Words
ability.summary: * This subtle power is a sort of malicious therapy, and it requires nothing more than casual conversation. Its influence is hidden by inflections and suggestions. The victim finds themselves increasing agitated as their inner demons bubble to the surface. This can lead to confusion, a panic attack, nervous breakdown or even a psychotic break.

ability.name: Warped Image

ability.name: Gestalt

ability.summary: * This ability allows a unit to share knowledge with another unit that also has [Gestalt]. They may give information or loan an ability to the target.

ability.name: Intellect Fortress

ability.name: Mirror Mind

ability.name: Tower of Iron Will

ability.summary: * Perform delicate manipulation on items from a distance. An example would be to perform lock picking over distance.

ability.name: Telekinetic Touch
