ability.reference: These aren't the droids you're looking for... - Obi-Wan Kenobi, Star Wars

ability.name: Lingua-Franca
ability.summary: Synergy with [Linguistics]

ability.name: Memory Restoration
ability.summary: * Retrieve lost memories from a subject.

ability.name: Mental Cloak
ability.summary: All living units must roll Mind vs Mental Cloak to target this unit. Another target may not be chosen.

ability.name: Mental Probe
ability.summary: Delve deeper into targets memories each turn.

ability.name: Mind Reading
ability.summary: Owner of target unit must announce the next Hits movements and actions that unit will perform. That unit must perform those actions if it is able.

ability.name: Mind's Eye
ability.summary: * Eye - The caster can close his eyes and see into the astral world instead of the real world.

ability.name: Store Consciousness
ability.summary: * [Action]: At the moment of another unit's death, capture its spirit within one's own mind. * [Action]: If the dead unit's body can somehow be restored (or a perfect duplicate can be found), transfer the captured spirit back into the body.

ability.name: Telepathy
ability.summary: Unit owner may have up to a Hits minute secret conversation with anyone (Player or not, strategy or not). Clock starts once roll is made.

ability.name: Transfer Consciousness
ability.reference: * Change Now! - Captain Jinyu, Dragonball Z

ability.name: Airlift
ability.summary: * Ability to pick up and drop cargo or [Airlift Ready] vehicles without landing.

ability.name: Levitate
ability.summary: * Levitate is a slow form of movement with a maximum speed of just half a normal Move. Levitating is very stable, silent, can move in any direction, and requires no concentration. Levitating causes no noise or movement related penalties and can avoid most terrain penalties as well.

ability.name: Reentry System
ability.summary: * A heat shield (either inflatable or built in) for atmospheric reentry.

ability.name: VTOL
ability.summary: * Hovering units may [Move] backwards. * Hovering units may use [Vector Movement] rule.

ability.name: Hover
ability.summary: * Hovering allows full movement speed over any flat terrain without actually touching the surface. Ground, Water, Sand, Ice, generally cause no penalty, but turning is difficult and imprecise especially at high speeds. * Hovering units may [Move] backwards. * Hovering units may use [Vector Movement] rule.

ability.name: Snowcraft
ability.summary: * Off Snow +1 Terrain Penalty.

ability.name: Sailed
ability.reference:
Estimated 18ft Skiff speeds at 20mph winds: 0 (180deg), 16mph (150deg), 26mph (120deg), 31mph (90deg), 32mph (60deg), 27mph (30deg), 19mph (0deg)
Estimated ice yacht speeds at 30mph winds: 0 (180deg), 95mph (150deg), 144mph (120deg), 165mph (90deg), 155mph (60deg), 115mph (30deg), 30mph (0deg)
ability.summary:
* Wind direction has an effect on all vehicles but it is most pronounced on sailing vessels. * [Setup] - Point Windsock in direction of the wind. If wind direction is not already determined, roll a die to randomize the wind direction. * [Move] - [-1 Speed] when starting the turn against the wind at an angle. * [Move] - [-2 Speed] when starting the turn directly against the wind.
Sailing speed is based on Wind speed, direction, angle of motion and vessel size. * Same direction as wind (Running Downwind): Max Speed = Wind Speed * 30 degrees off direction (Broad Reach): Max Speed = Wind Speed * 1.3 (* 4 on ice) * 60 degrees off direction (Broad Reach): Max Speed = Wind Speed * 1.5 (* 5 on ice) * 90 degrees off direction (Beam Reach): Max Speed = Wind Speed * 1.4 (* 5.5 on ice) * 120 degrees off direction (Close Reach): Max Speed = Wind Speed * 1.2 (* 4.8 on ice) * 150 degrees off direction (Close Hauled): Max Speed = Wind Speed * .7 (* 4 on ice) * 180 degrees (Head To Wind or In Irons): Max Speed = 0
Over distance, sailboats average speed over distance is further limited by their length at waterline: * This is estimated to be about 1.34 x the square root of the waterline length. * For a 144 ft sailboat at the waterline, the square root is 12, and the boat will probably not exceed 12 x 1.34, or about 16 knots/18mph/30kph. * A 100 footer should do 13.4 knots/15mph/25kph. * A 30 footer should do 7.34 knots/8mph/13kph. * A 16 footer should do 5.36 knots/6mph/10kph.

ability.name: Impulse Drive
ability.summary:
* The Impulse Drive is a drive system based upon the concept that repeated energy releases at the same harmonic frequency will cause small ripples in the fabric of space. * By rhythmic repetition, the Drive can cause an action/reaction effect against the fabric of space itself, therefore no longer needing reaction mass to travel large distances. * Further, the ripples in space cause space itself to slightly change orientation on each wave. Anything crossing a wave will suffer minor disruption. Light, lasers, radio waves, radiation, and relativistic particles are increasingly scattered as they strike each wave effectively dispersing them.
This spatial effect has a number of implications on space travel: * High energy radiation becomes unfocused effectively creating radiation shielding proportionate to the distance from the source. * Energy weapons, relativistic particle weapons, and railguns become unfocused and scattered effectively increasing the armor of the vessel proportionate to the distance of the weapon. * At long distances, the energy detected by radar and other detection devices (even telescopes) become diffused. This effectively provides the vessel with increased stealth proportionate to the distance of the detector. * At closer distances, microcircuitry becomes prone to failure and damage. This makes computer chips, the foundation of modern computer science, next to useless. Therefore, computer systems must be turned off when the wave drive is active. Piloting, weaponry, and navigation must therefore be performed manually with limited automation.

ability.name: Subspace Drive
ability.reference: * Comet Empire Subspace Attack Submarine
ability.summary: * By creating a minor fold in space, a unit may drop almost completely out of normal space while maintaining a small window through which it may still interact with normal space.

ability.name: Torch Drive
ability.titles: TISA, Trans-Gravitic, Interphased, Sub-Light Anamoly Drive
ability.summary: * This drive creates a tight gravity well around the ship dropping it partially out of normal space. Because the ship is no longer in normal space, it does not actually move. What does move is the interface between normal space and the ship. Speed and direction are adjusted by controlling the depth and shape of the field. * There are a number of distinct advantages to this drive system. Because the ship in not moving, it is not subject to inertia or problems incurred at relativistic speeds. * Combat with the Torch drive is unique for several reasons. The occupants are not subject to the enormous stress of maneuvering at relativistic speeds. Conventional weapons have greatly reduced effect because only damage that crosses the interface has any effect on the ship. * Weaknesses - The Torch drive must also maintain a protective gravity bubble to defend against its own gravity well. Weapons designed to disrupt the Torch drive have a strong effect by making the ship more vulnerable to damage, by reducing its speed, by subjecting it to increased stress from travelling at relativistic speeds, and by exposing it to its own gravity well.

ability.name: Hyperdrive
ability.titles: FTL Drive, Gravity Drive, Gravity Lens, Subspace Drive, T-Drive, Tachyon Drive, Warp Drive
ability.summary: * Faster than light travel can be accomplished by warping space into a Wormhole/Black hole, dropping out of normal space and travelling through the parallel universe called Hyperspace/Tachyon Space where physical laws are not bound by the relationship between mass and the speed of light, and finally returning to normal space by creating another space warp. * Hyperspace/Tachyon Space - Tachyon Space, like other dimensions is at right angles to our existing 3 dimension. In Hyperspace, time and distance have different meanings, all particles are tachyons, and the speed of light is an absolute minimum speed instead of a maximum. Travelling through Hyperspace is exceptionally hazardous. In fact, any deviation from the calculated route cause the corridor to collapse leaving one stranded in Hyperpace forever with no way to calculate a return. * Calculating a Route - Once a destination is chosen, complex calculations must be performed to calculate a direct route from the current location to the destination through the shifting reality of Hyperspace. A successful route will be a 'straight' line through Hyperspace. Proximity to a gravity well makes these calculations next to impossible. Typically, all ship computer resources are required for this calculation and the larger the ship fewer the available routes and therefore the greater the complexity. Ships may only enter and exit hyperspace at the edge of a solar system and must use conventional sub light drives within the system. A day or more at sub-light speed is therefore required to reach or leave a planet in an inner solar system. Route calculation time is roughly light years x tons / 10secs (e.g. 4 light years x 100 tons / 10 = 40sec. * Hyperspace Corridor - Once calculated, the ship must meet the speed defined by the calculation while modulating the Hyperdrive energy signature to match the bridge to Hyperspace. If all goes well, the vast energies in Tachyon Space will form a corridor directly to the destination. Errors in any of the steps usually involve intense gravitional shearing forces that will at best cause damage to the Hyperdrive and leave the traveller stranded in deep space, or worse, Hyperspace. * Travel in Hyperspace - Hyperspace travel is typically a boring affair. The Hyperspace corridor carries the ship to its destination, so no manuevering is needed. The time spent in Hyperspace varies, but is usually proportional to the distance. Transit time is roughly 2 hours per light year travelled (e.g. 4 light years x 2 = 8hours) * Tachyon Doppler Effect - When the Hyperspace Corridor is created, both ends of the corridor will start leaking Tachyons which can be detected by sensitive instruments. The amount of Tachyons increases with the size of the ship, the distance travelled and the closer the time of arrival. * Tachyon Relay Network - Satellites at the edge of stellar systems use Hyperspace Corridors to beam tranmissions through Hyperspace to their opposites in other systesm. Since these communications have negligible mass, the calculations are nearly instantaneous though the same transit times apply. * History - Imaginary Space, I-Space - While studying fusion plant efficiency using various algorithms, a surprising discovery was made: very rarely and seemingly at random, the plant would produce a tiny tachyon burst. After decades of study, a pattern began to emerge along with a shocking discovery: only algorithms using imaginary numbers could trigger a burst and a small amount of particles were actually disappearing during the event. Where the particles were going became the primary focus of astrophysics from then on. Eventually a hypothesis gathered momentum. The particles were leaving real space and traveling along trajectories plotted through so called imaginary space. This implied that the destination of the particles could be predicted. After much trial and error another breakthrough: a second tachyon burst moments after the first and many kilometers away. The particles had returned. Faster than light travel was possible. The implications for communications were immediately obvious, but could something larger make the trip? Research was slow because increased mass meant increased complexity. The power and computational needs were high but not unachievable. Only a decade later the first successful test craft made the trip. A decade later commercial hyperdrives became available. A decade later they were affordable on even modest starships.

power.name: Jump Drive
power.titles: Gate Drive, Stargate, Wave Motion Engine, Wormhole
power.reference: * I created the Event Horizon to reach the stars, but she's gone much, much farther than that. She tore a hole in our universe, a gateway to another dimension. A dimension of pure chaos. Pure... evil. When she crossed over, she was just a ship. But when she came back... she was alive! - Dr. Weir, Event Horizon
power.summary: * Jump Drives generate energy pulses in the ship's drive to create ripples in the fabric of space. Each pulse must be precisely timed to the apex of each ripple to create an increasing harmonic wave (the 'Wave Motion' effect). Eventually, the energy of the occillation becomes too great, a tear in space is produced, and the starship falls in.

ability.name: Strategic Warp Jump
ability.summary: * A ship with a Warp Engine may perform a strategic warp jump and instantly remove itself from combat, returning to the strategic map. * A unit already on the strategic map may move [Skill] spaces on the strategic map. * [Requires]: The unit must cease maneuvering and must perform this ability for 3 consecutive turns. * [Action]: On the second consecutive action, the unit immediately removes all Vector tokens and moves the unit to any other space on the map.

ability.name: Tactical Warp Jump
ability.summary: * A ship with a Warp Engine may perform a tactical warp jump and instantly transport from any space on the map to any other. * [Requires]: The unit must cease maneuvering and must perform this ability for 2 consecutive turns. * [Action]: On the second consecutive action, the unit immediately removes all Vector tokens and moves the unit to any other space on the map.

ability.name: Teleport Away
ability.summary: * Teleport an object/objects to a precisely known location. * Level determines size of object/objects and distance. * Tricks: Teleporting mines, bombs, fighters, drill missiles.

ability.name: Teleport Toward
ability.reference: Beam me up Scotty
ability.summary: * Teleport an object/objects that you know the exact location of to your location. * Level determines size of object/objects and distance.

power.name: Dimensional Travel
power.reference: * I reject your reality and substitute my own. - Adam Savage, Mythbusters

ability.name: Dimension Drop
ability.summary: * Send a small object through a dimensional portal and immediately close it again. This is most practical for sending messages or explosives.

ability.name: Dimensional Interference
ability.summary: * Create an area that is more difficult to use dimensional or teleporting abilities.

ability.name: Dimensional Teleport
ability.summary: * Move rapidly from one location to another by creating a wormhole between the locations.

ability.name: Dimension Trace
ability.summary: * Detect the origin of a Teleporter, Dimensional Portal, or an [Outsider].

ability.name: Dimension Track
ability.summary: * Track the destination of someone who recently travelled using Teleport or Dimensional Travel. Also can be used to track an [Outsider] as if the user had [Tracking].

ability.name: Dimensional Trap
ability.summary: * Open a Dimensional Portal that opens when a target enters the area, draws them through, and then closes behind.

ability.name: Dimensional Walk
ability.summary: * Move rapidly over terrain by quickly phasing in and out of the current space.

power.name: Time Travel
power.summary: * The Vortex is a point of null space-time. It is a tunnel through which one can escape the bounds of space-time. * Here time and distance have no meaning. Travelers through the Vortex have no sense of their own body, but have a strong sense that they have been in the Vortex forever. Some suggest that this may actually be true. * Entering the Vortex is like dying. Leaving is like being born. Some suggest that this birth and death cycle is the reason why only living things may be brought through the Vortex.

ability.name: Reverse Time
ability.summary: * Rewind recent events within the surrounding area and possibly choose a different [Action].

ability.name: Doppleganger
ability.summary: Take on the appearance of someone else.

ability.name: Eye of the Beholder
ability.summary: * Appear differently to different viewers.

power.name: Armored
power.summary: * Armor normally alters appearance and may be a permanent alteration or a suit that may be donned. * [+1 Value] for Armor that can appear on demand. * [+2 Value] for Armor that cannot be detected. Body Armor may be permanent or temporary. If permanent, no time is needed to activate it, but is must either be donned and carried or it permanently alters appearance.

ability.name: Auto Med System
ability.summary: * Detects severe damage to the wearer and automatically takes action to reduce shock and maintain suit integrity (sealing leaks or amputating if necessary).

ability.name: Ablative Armor
ability.summary: * Armor that vaporizes when hit decreasing damage but also damaging the armor. * Ignore the first point of [Damage] and reduce [Armor] (on that facing) instead.

ability.name: Hardened vs. Energy
ability.summary: * [Damage]: [+2 Armor] if attack is an [Energy Weapon] * Only 1 Hardened vs. ability may be taken

ability.name: Body Flares
ability.summary: * Detects and distracts heat seaking missiles, * [Passive] - +1 Defense vs. Heat-Seaking Missiles (3 uses)

ability.name: Corrosion Resistance
ability.summary: * [Passive] - +1 Armor vs. Corrosive Agents

ability.name: Cyro Sleep System
ability.summary: * Can freeze the wearer into cryo-sleep and armor runs on minimal power to preserve the wearer from hostile environments or critical wounds for up to a month before power gives out.

ability.name: Electrical Resistance
ability.summary: * [Passive] - +1 Armor vs. Electricity

ability.name: Environmental Containment
ability.summary: * Suit is sealed against chemical and biological weapons except corrosive ones. It is also water-proof.

ability.name: Environmental Independence
ability.summary: * Suit is sealed against most hostile environments including space. Does not include corrosive environments. * Requires - [Enviromental Containment]

ability.name: Floation Device
ability.summary: * An emergency floatation device.

ability.name: Grappling Hoist
ability.summary: * A grappling dart that is fired into stone or hooked onto any uneven surface. The attached winch can then pull the wearer to the target or vis versa depending on relative weight. This can be used for climbing or towing. The darts can be recovered and reused, but they are often not recoverable. 2 replacement darts are included.

ability.name: Hardened vs. Fire
ability.summary: * [Damage]: [+2 Armor] if attack produces [Fire] tokens * Only 1 Hardened vs. ability may be taken

ability.name: Hardened vs. Projectiles
ability.summary: * [Damage]: [+2 Armor] if attack is a [Projectile] * Only 1 Hardened vs. ability may be taken

ability.name: Infrared Dampener
ability.summary: * By activating this system, the armor reduces all heat signatures. Use of any system (even passive ones) will negate the stealth. * [Continuous Action] - Stealth vs. Infrared Sensors

ability.name: Magnetic Resistance
ability.summary: * Reduces the chance that a magnetic attachment can hold on the armor (assuming it is metallic). * [Passive] - +1 Armor vs. Magnetism

ability.name: Missile Mount
ability.summary: * A special mount to add a missile pack on the back of the armor.

ability.name: Plasma Resistance
ability.summary: * Detects and disrupts the magnetic bottle surrounding plasma rounds causing them to detonate too early. * [Passive] - +1 Armor vs. Plasma

ability.name: Pressure Resistance
ability.summary: * [Passive] - +1 Armor vs. Pressure and Impact

ability.name: Radar Dampener
ability.summary: * By activating this system, the armor reduces all radar signatures. Use of any system (even passive ones) will negate the stealth. * [Continuous Action] - Stealth vs. Radar

ability.name: Radar Jammer
ability.summary: * By activating this system, the armor emits powerful radar white noise. * [Continuous Action] - [-Range] Radar sensors detection to any target within range.

ability.name: Radiation Resistance
ability.summary: * [Passive] - +1 Armor vs. Radiation

ability.name: Reactive Armor
ability.summary: * Exterior layer of armor explodes on impact reducing damage of the first hit but reduces armor rating for all subsequent hits. * [Passive] - +2 Armor vs. the first hit. -1 Armor for each subsequent hit.

ability.name: Turret Mount
ability.summary: * A special mount to add a turreted weapon on the back of the armor.

ability.name: Ultraviolet Jammer
ability.summary: * By activating this system, the armor emits a powerful blinding strobe in the ultraviolet band. * [Continuous Action] - [-Range] Ultraviolet sensors detection to any target within range.

ability.name: Underwater Operation
ability.summary: * Sealed against water and can operate underwater. Small thrusters allow slow movement underwater. Oxygen scrubbers allow extended underwater operation.

ability.name: Lernaean Regeneration
ability.summary: * [Activate]: If unit is Damaged, Remove a Damage Token and add a White Close Combat Token.

ability.name: Recover
ability.summary: * May roll extra dice when resisting [Disease] or [Poison].

ability.name: Regeneration
ability.summary: * [Passive] * [Bleeding] and [Damage] Tokens are considered Yellow Tokens.

ability.name: Wall Running
ability.summary: * Requires: [Wall Crawling]

ability.name: Water Running
ability.summary: * Requires: [Water Walking]

ability.name: Bite
ability.summary: * The fighter savagely bites his opponent. * Criticals - [Piercing]

ability.name: Claw
ability.summary: * The fighter attacks with both claws. * Criticals - [Bleeding]

ability.name: Claw Rake
ability.summary: * A quick raking claw attack with one set of claws. * +2 Initiative * -1 Accuracy * +1 Move * Criticals - [Bleeding]

ability.name: Feather Blades
ability.summary: * Feathers become as hard as steel and may be used as swords.

ability.name: Feather Knives
ability.summary: * Feathers become as hard as steel and may be thrown like knives.

ability.name: Horns
ability.summary: * Usually they are worn as antlers, but may sprout form anywhere on the body.

ability.name: Jaw Lock
ability.summary: * The fighter locks his powerful jaws onto the opponent to immobilize. * Damage - [Slow] * Criticals - [Piercing]

ability.name: Jaws of Death
ability.summary: * Fericiously attack with huge bites.

ability.name: Neck Bite
ability.summary: * After grabbing an opponent, the fighter bites the neck/shoulders of the opponents doing damage each turn. * Requires: [Hold], [Continuous Hold] * +1 Initiative * +1 Accuracy * Critcals - [Bleeding]

ability.name: Pounce
ability.summary: * The fighter drops into a crouch and then explodes into a mighty leap at his prey attempting to knock down the opponent. * [Aerial] * +1 Accuracy * +1 Move * Criticals - [Knockdown]

ability.name: Ripping Bite
ability.summary: * The fighter strikes a limb with the intention to disable his opponent. * -1 Initiative * -1 Damage * +1 Critical - [Bleeding] or [Weakness]

ability.name: Savage Genitalia
ability.summary: * Male variations include excessive length, hardness, spines, and thorns. * Female variations include teeth, ripping suction, crushers, and grinders. * [Hidden Weapon] * -2 Initiative * -1 Accuracy * +1 Critical

ability.name: After Image
ability.reference: * Dragon Ball * Phantom Miria - Claymore
ability.summary: * Evade: Instantly make a Move without triggering Opportunity Attacks.

ability.name: Fast Actions
ability.summary: * Time to complete time consuming actions is dramatically reduced.

ability.name: Hyper Punch
ability.summary: * Action: Perform a basic [Attack] on a single target. If the attack succeeds, roll additional damage dice up to level.

ability.name: Hyper Storm
ability.summary: Action: Use a Move and perform a basic [Attack] up to 1 target per level on each target along your path. If the attack succeeds, roll additional damage dice up to level.

ability.name: Cosmic Awareness
ability.reference: Captain Marvel, Gundam New Types

ability.name: Electromagnetic Vision
ability.summary: See into radio and radiation band of electromagnetic spectrum

ability.name: Radio Sense
ability.summary: * May hear radio, television, shortwave, and even cellular telephone communications when concentrating.

ability.name: Ultrasonic/Subsonic Hearing
ability.summary: * Hear ultra high or low pitched sounds. Subsonic sounds can travel extreme distances and are some of the communication systems used by whales and elephants.

ability.name: X-Ray Vision
ability.reference: * Superman: Bruce Wayne? Batman: You peeked. - Superman and Batman, Superman: The Animated Series
ability.summary: * See through solid objects. The higher the density the blurrier the vision.

power.name: Strength
power.reference: * Technique is for lightweights. - Sett, Runeterra

ability.name: Power Lift
ability.summary: * Lift additional kg equal to Power Rating.

ability.name: Power Strike
ability.summary: * Add Power Rating to weapon damage using Melee, or Close Combat.

ability.name: Power Throw
ability.summary: * Add Power Rating to weapon damage when throwing any object or weapon.

power.name: Adaptation
power.summary: Ability to survive in hostile environments. Higher power levels ignore the effects of increasingly hostile environments.

ability.name: Adapt to Micro Impact
ability.summary: * Can endure the impact of very small, high velocity particles like micro meterorites and small caliber bullets.

ability.name: Acid Blood
ability.reference: Gestates in a human host and has concentrated acid for blood - Aliens

ability.name: Aspect of Wolf
ability.reference: Everquest

ability.name: Cat Feet
ability.summary: * Reduce damage from falls

power.name: Demonic Power
power.summary: * Yoki - , or 'demon essence' (the first character means demon, and second character is the same as the Chinese word commonly known as chi).

ability.name: Arm Stretch
ability.summary: * [Action]: May perform known [Punch] ability at range.

ability.name: Body Stretch
ability.reference: * You need to be more ... flexible. - Elastigirl, The Incredibles

ability.name: Leg Stretch
ability.summary: * [Action]: May perform known [Kick] ability at range.

ability.name: Reincarnation
ability.reference: * Doctor Who

power.name: Lycanthropy
power.summary: * Lycanthropy is an inherited trait that normally lies dormant. It seems to be triggered by near death experiences with other Lycanthropes. !Traits * Permanent - Lycanthropy is an inherited trait and cannot be 'cured'. * Rage - Lycanthropes are easily angered and are subject to berserk rages. ** [Anytime]: When taunted or after taking 2 or more damage, the unit must roll Lycanthropy vs. Spirit, gaining [Berserk] Tokens for each Hit. If the unit has any [Berserk] Tokens it immediately takes a non human Lycanthropy form on its next [Action]. ** [Daily]: On the first nights of the waxing and waning Moons or on any night under a Full Moon, the unit must check for going berserk as if taunted. * [Tooth and Claw] ** Requires: Must be in a non human form. ** Passive ** +1 Melee or Close Combat for each [Rage] Token.

ability.name: Animal Form
ability.summary: * Action: Change to specific animal unit. ** +1 Move, -2 Mind, +1 Spirit. ** Clothes and Armor are destroyed or dropped. All Equipment is dropped. ** Gain [Natural Weaponry] and [Regeneration] Abilities. ** Duration: Until sunrise.

ability.name: Primal Animal Form
ability.reference: American Werewolf in London

ability.name: Beastman Form
ability.reference: Wolfman or Mr. Hyde.
ability.summary: * Action: Change to bestial humanoid unit. ** +1 Body, -1 Mind. ** Shirt and Armor is destroyed or dropped. ** Gain [Regeneration] Ability. ** Duration: Until sunrise.

ability.name: Crinos Form
ability.reference: The Howling
ability.summary: * Requires: [Animal Form], [Beastman Form] * Action: Change to specific Crinos unit. ** +2 Body, -2 Mind, +1 Spirit. ** Clothes and Armor are destroyed or dropped. ** All Equipment not in hands is dropped. ** Gain [Natural Weaponry], [Armor], and [Regeneration] Abilities. ** Each [[Bleeding]] or [[Damage]] Token taken grants a [[Rage]] Token. ** Each [[Bleeding]] Token inflicted grants a [[Rage]] Token. ** Each adjacent Ally or Foe slain grants a [[Rage]] Token. ** Remove a [[Rage]] Token instead of gaining a [[Hold]], [[Control]], [[Morale]], [[Despair]] or [[Fear]] Token. ** If [[Rage]] Tokens exceed Spirit, then roll [[Rage]] vs [[Spirit]] or gain a [[Berserk]] Token. ** Duration: Until sunrise.

ability.name: Human Form
ability.summary: * Action: Change back to human unit from other Lycanthropy form. * Duration: Indefinite

ability.name: Mark Territory
ability.summary: * By scenting an area, animals and supernatural beings will recognize the scent as a warning to stay away. Aggressive beings may be drawn to it.

ability.name: Mirror Walk
ability.summary: * Action: As a creature of spirit, Lycanthropes may enter the [Spirit Realm] merely by looking at their reflection in any surface.

ability.name: Spirit Claw
ability.summary: * Allows unit to attack targets across the [Veil].

ability.name: Phase Jump
ability.summary: * The ability to move without travelling through the intervening space. * [Action]: Instantly move to any empty space up to 1/3 speed away without passing through any intervening spaces.

ability.name: Phase Walk
ability.summary: * The ability to move through solid matter. * [Action]: Move at half speed ignoring terrain penalties or other objects. While Phase Walking, the user takes no physical damage (unless it is magical). If the move ends in a solid object, the user is still considered to be Phase Walking unitl it no longer ends it turn on a solid object. No attacks can be made this turn.

power.name: Reality Warping
power.summary: * Perhaps equal to Time Travel as the most powerful of all abilities. By altering reality, seemingly nothing is beyond possibility.

ability.name: Closed Universe
ability.reference: * M.C. Escher, Relativity * Land of the Lost
ability.summary: * Exits from a location loop back upon themselves to leave a person back where they started.

ability.name: Physical Imitation
ability.reference: * Imitation is the sincerest form of flattery.
* So, how do we know who's human? If I was an imitation, a perfect imitation, how would you know it was really me? - Childs, The Thing

ability.name: Copy Other
ability.summary: Split target into 2 copies, each with -1 on all abilities.

ability.name: Copy Self
ability.summary: Split yourself into 2 copies, each with -1 on all abilities.

ability.name: Offspring
ability.reference: * A Cell gets out, and it will IMITATE EVERYTHING on the face of the EARTH! AND NOTHING CAN STOP IT! - Blair, The Thing

power.name: Toxins
power.reference: * Say 'ah'. Some poisons can kill people in the thousands with that amount. Like botulinum toxin. It inhibits acetylcholine release, causing loss of muscle tone, lethary, .. dizziness .., visual impairment.., heavy eyelids, intense thirst, loss of speech, vomiting, diarrhea, stomach distention, breathing difficulty.. then.. respiratory failure. - A.K.I, Street Fighter 6

ability.name: Poisonous Flesh
ability.summary: * Poisonous if bitten

ability.name: Poisonous Skin
ability.summary: * Poisonous to the touch

power.name: Transformation
power.reference: * Let me change into something a little more... Comfortable. - Elise, Runeterra

ability.name: Combination
ability.reference: * Form feet and legs; form arms and body; and I'll form the head! - Keith, Voltron
ability.summary: * [Action]: Unit may combine with another unit with this ability to form a new unit with their combined value of Transformation skills or less.

ability.name: Matter Chameleon
ability.reference: Kevin from Ben 10
ability.summary: * Transform body into any material touched

ability.name: Metal Form
ability.reference: * Colossus - X-men * I'm bulletproof, nothing to lose...fire away, fire away...richochet, you take your aim... fire away, fire away...you shoot me down, but I won't fall...I am titanium - David Guetta, Titanium
ability.summary: * Transform body into any material touched

ability.name: Plant Form
ability.reference: * Swamp Thing, Man-Thing

ability.name: Transform
ability.reference: More Than Meets the Eye - Transformers
ability.summary: * [Action]: Change into a new unit with skill points equal to Transform.

power.name: Vampirism
power.summary: * Any unit with Vampirism is by definition a [Vampire]. * [Deploy]: Start with [Vampire Blood] Tokens equal to Vampirisim. * Generations - When a Vampire is created, it automatically gains the Vampire Generation ability one less than the one who created them. A Vampire can only gain a lower Generation by [Diablerie]. * Vitae - The blood * Hunger - Vampires are always hungry, unless they have recently killed.

ability.name: Vampire: 14th Generation
ability.summary: * The last generation is known as thin-blooded vampires and start with only basic Vampiric powers. During the Dark Ages the Thirteenth Generation was believed to be the last, but in the Final Nights this is comprised of the 14th and 15th Generations.

ability.name: Vampire: 12th Generation
ability.summary: * Although they lack the powers of the lower generations, the vampires of the 12th and 13th generations stand above men, capable of besting the strongest mortal knight in battle and wielding influence over barons, merchants and courts.

ability.name: Vampire: 10th Generation
ability.summary: * While they are comparatively young, most vampires created within the last few centuries belong to the tenth and eleventh generation.

ability.name: Vampire: 8th Generation
ability.summary: * Achieving a delicate balance between age and generation, these vampires are the most visible ones of the 14th century. They are nowhere near as old as most Cainites of lower generation, which places them in a delicate position. Most Cainites of eighth and ninth generation overcome this disadvantage by siring large covens of childer.

ability.name: Vampire: 6th Generation
ability.summary: * Many of the vampires of the sixth and seventh generation are the self-styled lords of Cainite society. Although they are not as powerful as the Methuselahs, these Cainites are still formidable opponents, who gladly sacrifice mystical and spiritual power for temporal influence. These Cainites rule over vast kingdoms, donning the crown of monarchs and commanding armies of younger Cainites and mortal thralls.

ability.name: Vampire: 4th Generation
ability.summary: * Methsuselahs are the most powerful modern Vampires that have been encountered. They are terrifyingly alien and powerful. It is hard to imagine the power of the lower Generations, given the strenght of the 4th Generation.

ability.name: Vampire: 3rd Generation
ability.summary: * Thirteen ancient Vampires were thought to have survived past the great flood and to have started the existing clans. Presumably the Antediluvians are of such age and potency of blood that they possess nearly god-like power, and in fact some of them may be deities. Most believe these god-like beings to be either in torpor, manipulating the Jyhad, or dead. While some clans regard their progenitor favorably, as a whole the Antediluvians are often portrayed as boogeymen that will one day rise and devour their descendants in at time called Gehenna.

ability.name: Vampire: 2nd Generation
ability.summary: * It is said that there were three second generation Vampires: Enoch, the Wise (Caine's advisor), Irad, the Strong (Caine's general) and Zillah, the Beautiful (Caine's wife). They lived in the first city and presumably created the Antedeluvians, but nothing is known of them after their childer rose up against them in the final nights of the First City. Perhaps the Second Generation perished in the Deluge, or at the hands of their childer.

ability.name: Vampire: 1st Generation
ability.summary: * Only Cain, the original Vampire, is 1st generation. After all this time, his abilities would be beyond imagination.

weakness.name: Diablerie
weakness.summary: * Diablerie is the act of a vampire drinking the blood of another vampire until it is destroyed. It is the ultimate symbol of the treachery innate in vampire society. * Diablerie is standard practice among the Sabbat and is strictly forbidden by the Carmarilla on pain of final death. Diablerie is one of the defining differences between the two sects. * Drinking blood from mortals is an ecstatic experience, the moment of death the climax. Drinking the eternal blood of vampires is that much more gratifying, with the moment of death a feeling like no other. Particularly corrupt vampires will commit diablerie simply for the pleasure. * This weakness is gained automatically when it is used successfully. Once gained, this ability forever marks the user and is clearly visible to those with can read auras. * [Requires]: Can only be used after a [Drink Blood] or [Consume Flesh] action on a vampire that drains the last of his blood. * [Automatic]: The vampire is destroyed and the [Diablerie] ability is gained. If the destroyed vampire has a higher level in [Vampirism], then the acting vampire immediately gains one level in [Vampirism].

weakness.name: Rarified Tastes
weakness.summary: * As Vampires age, their taste for blood becomes increasingly refined and they can no longer tolerate 'common' blood. Very old Vampires have exceedingly exotic tastes.

ability.name: Blood Sight
ability.summary: * See blood through the skin. * With close observation, subtle blood characteristics can be detected including blood diseases, poisoning, or Diablerie

ability.name: Consume Flesh
ability.summary: * Consume the flesh of a grabbed unit. Gain a [Vampire Blood] token and target gains a [Damage] and a [Spirit Damage]. * You may not gain more [Vampire Blood] than target has [Spirit], though you gain one more [Vampire Blood] if the target is slain by drinking its blood. * You may not have more [Vampire Blood] than [Vampirism]. * You may not drink from the dead.

ability.name: Drink Blood
ability.summary: * Drink blood from a grabbed unit. Gain a [Vampire Blood] token and target gains a [Damage] and a [Spirit Damage]. * You may not gain more [Vampire Blood] than target has [Spirit], though you gain one more [Vampire Blood] if the target is slain by drinking its blood. * You may not have more [Vampire Blood] than [Vampirism]. * You may not drink from the dead.

ability.name: Embrace
ability.reference: * It was magical. The surrender. The exquisite suicide of giving in ... words cannot encompass that experience ... I asked him ... 'What gives you the right?' ... My question had struck no chord of mercy ... Rather, I believe he wanted me to become as he was and see for myself what gave him the right - what gives all of our kind the right.
ability.summary: * Sire - When a Vampire creates a another the creator is called its Sire.

ability.name: Torpor
ability.summary: * If slain, but the body is not burned or the head severed, the vampire will not die but instead enter a deep sleep while his body slowly recovers. * It is said that very old Vampires may be sleeping for centuries in Torpor.

section.name: Cybernetics
section.summary: * Faux Flesh (Faux Skin) - The great breakthrough in cybernetics was not in machinery but in synthetic flesh. Faux Flesh is a foam that hardens into soft, realistic flesh that will not be rejected by user's immune system. Faux Flesh can be injected between machine parts and is used at all interface points between living tissue and cyberware. It seals wounds like chalking and is a staple of medical kits.

power.name: Cybernetic Arm
power.summary: * All abilities assume both arms are cybernetic. If only one is used all abilities are at -1.

ability.name: Cybernetic Claws
ability.reference: * I'm the best at what I do - Wolverine

ability.name: Cybernetic Electrifier
ability.summary: * Discharge a massive electric charge through the palms of the hands.

ability.name: Cybernetic Weapon Arm
ability.summary: * Nonconsealable. * One or both arms may be replaced with heavy weapons from rifles, grenade launchers, micromissile launchers, up to miniguns.

ability.name: Cybernetic Weapon Hand
ability.summary: * A regular pistol or SMG of any sort may be modified to fit into a cybernetic arm. This ability may be purchased for each arm.

ability.name: Sonic Filter
ability.summary: * Reduces sonic damage

power.name: Cybernetic Hearing
power.summary: * All abilities assume both ears are cybernetic. If only one is used all abilities are at -1.

ability.name: Enhanced Hearing Range
ability.summary: * Can hear supersonic and subsonic sounds.

ability.name: Voice Stress Analyzer
ability.summary: * Detects stress in the target's voice. Often this means lying.

ability.name: Breast Enhancement
ability.summary: * Size and shape may be changed at will

ability.name: Cybersnake
ability.summary: * A visious close combat weapon that is implanted in mouth, stomach, or genitals! When in Close Combat range, the Cybersnake may lash out with surprise and land a potentially fatal blow.

ability.name: Cyberteeth
ability.reference: * Jaws - Moonraker

ability.name: Cybernetic Rebreather
ability.summary: * May survive without fresh air for 10 minutes per level.

ability.name: Cybernetic Tail
ability.summary: * Adds a tail

ability.name: Gas Filter
ability.summary: * Filters harmful gases from the particles from the air, so they never reach the lungs.

ability.name: Nasal Filter
ability.summary: * Removes particles from the air including sand, dust, pollen, and other large particles.

ability.name: Voice Descrambler
ability.summary: * May understand encrypted audio information if you know the key.

ability.name: Voice Scrambler
ability.summary: * May speak in encrypted phrases that only a descrambler with the key can understand.

power.name: Cybernetic Interface
power.summary: * Cybernetic Interface include mostly software-based sensors and systems.

ability.name: Cybernetic Countermeasures
ability.summary: * Hardens cybernetic computer components against attempts to hack or scramble it systems.

ability.name: Cybernetic Recorders
ability.summary: * Can record or playback audio and video

ability.name: Direct Comm Link
ability.summary: * Listen to your music collection or radio stations, watch television, surf the web, or make phone calls. * Because these are neural links, they do not actually require cybernetic eyes or ears.

ability.name: Direct Neural Link
ability.reference: * Do you think that's air your breathing?

ability.name: Skill Chip Interface
ability.reference: * I know Kung Fu * Do you know how to fly that thing? Not yet. - The Matrix

power.name: Cybernetic Legs
power.summary: * All abilities assume both legs are cybernetic. If only one is used all abilities are at -1.

ability.name: Cybernetic Tractor
ability.summary: * Nonconsealable. * Replace both legs with wheels or treads.

ability.name: Webbed Foot
ability.summary: * Enhanced swimming

power.name: Netrunning
power.reference: * Do not try and bend the spoon. That's impossible. Instead, only try to realize the truth. What truth? There is no spoon. There is no spoon? Then you will see that it is not the spoon that bends. It is only yourself. - The Matrix * You must let it all go... Fear... Doubt... Disbelief. Free Your Mind. - Morpheus, The Matrix
power.summary: * By directly connecting the brain to a computer program, the user can greatly increase his reaction time and resourcefulness while travelling in cyberspace. * Netrunners - Outlaw computer jocks or hackers. * SysOps - Corporate or government computer system defenders. * ICE - Intrusion Countermeasures Electronics. Guardian software designed to thwart hackers and intrusion programs. * Black ICE - ICE programs designed to trap and harm the hackers or software it is defending against. This can range from induced system failures, data loss, or dangerous electric feedback. Numerous safeguards exist against such dangerous software, but Black ICE attempts to lure the user into believing that by lowering these safeguards that he will have the opportunity to steal information. Often to make this lure credible, actual information must be put at risk. * ICE Breker - Software designed to counter ICE. * Avatar - The digital representation of those in the NET.

ability.name: Code Breaker Program
ability.summary: * Attempts to fool a [Gateway Program] that you are a legitimate user.

ability.name: Denial Of Service Program
ability.summary: * Attempts to overwhelm the target program with millions of requests, thereby preventing legitimate users from accessing it until it can catch up with all of the requests.

ability.name: Freeze Program
ability.summary: * Attempts to alter the target program's internal clock, thereby slowing it or causing it to become non-responsive for a short about of time.

ability.name: Jackhammer Program
ability.summary: * Attempts to damage a [Firewall Program]. Such blatant attempts immediately raise alarms and are often a tool of last resort.

power.name: Air
power.titles: Aeromancer. Storm Lord, Storm Shaman, Weather Witch, Wind Rider, Wind Walker
power.reference: * But still the clever north wind was not satisfied. It spoke to Vianne of towns yet to be visited, friends in need yet to be discovered, battles yet to be fought... - Chocolat * You're really going to trust me ... My mind is like the wind on the waves. It could change in an instant. - Kazuha, Genshin Impact
power.summary: * Air is the element of freedom. Air elementalists remain distant from worldly concerns. They are always in continous motion, moving from place to place and never putting down roots. * Symbol - White Swirling Wind * Personality - Airy, Flighty, Emphemeral, Ethereal, Gossamer

specialty.name: Aeromancy
specialty.summary: * Aero is the magical version of Air. * Aero effects can be sustained without a source, but they can also be canceled by counter-magic. * Aero reacts with Pyro to produce the [Wildfire] effect. * Aero reacts with Cryo to produce the [Chill] effect. * Aero reacts with Hydro to produce the [Fog] effect. * Aero reacts with Electro to produce the [Ionized] effect. * Aero reacts with Geo to produce the [Weightess] effect.

ability.name: Acid Rain
ability.summary: * Calls acid rain from an existing cloud.

ability.name: Air Breathing
ability.summary: * Can breath in any kind of air without ill effect including poison gases.

ability.name: Call Storm
ability.summary: * Calls a storm cloud.

ability.name: Carried on the Wind
ability.summary: * By focusing, the user can detect small things carried on the wind. Smoke, pollen, poison, unusual smells, ash, dust, faint sounds, etc. may be detected with uncanny ability. Higher levels detect more distanct and faint things.

ability.name: Control Winds
ability.summary: * Effect: Raise or lower Wind strength.

ability.name: Eye of the Storm
ability.summary: * [Action]: Create an eye in the storm that reduces [Wind Intensity] in 1 space radius for each Hit. * [Continue]: Reroll wind reduction and radius increases by 2 up to Level radius. * [Discontinue]: Wind returns to normal at same rate it was reduced.

ability.name: Hurricane
ability.summary: * Buildup

ability.name: Lightning Charge
ability.summary: * Imbue an item with electric charge that is discharged on contact.

ability.name: Spindrift
ability.summary: * Wind generates a thick mist above any body of water.

ability.name: Summon Cloud
ability.summary: * Summons a large living cloud in moisture rich air. This can obscure vision.

ability.name: Summon Gust
ability.summary: * Summons a small living wind on items that may be blown in the breeze. Air elementals love nothing more than pushing things around.

ability.name: Temperature Control
ability.summary: * Effect: Raise or lower Temperature, Humidity.

ability.name: Tempest in a Teapot
ability.summary: * Hits have no effect. Criticals change Weather Intensity.

ability.name: Voices Carry
ability.summary: Listen to conversation within line of sight.

ability.name: Weather Sight
ability.summary: * Analyze and predict weather

ability.name: Whispering Winds
ability.summary: Speak to others (one way) over long distances.

ability.name: Wind Blade
ability.summary: * Create an ephemeral Sword created from thin air. It acts as a normal sword except that it does [Knockback] instead of [Bleeding].

ability.name: Wind Blast
ability.reference: * Where the two winds meet, there I will see the Wind Scar - Inuyasha

ability.name: Wind Form
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Stand in a breeze. * [Action]: Gain attributes of Wind as well as [Wind Walk] for the turn. * [Continue]: May make [Strike] and [Grab] Wind Close Combat attacks at Level.

ability.name: Wind Wall
ability.summary: * Wall that deflects missles and strikes aerial units.

ability.name: Updraft
ability.summary: * [Action]: Apply [Wind] in a radius around user, lift enemies off the ground with Level weight, and hurl them down, if they strike a surface they take Level damage .

power.name: Cold
power.titles: Frost Lord, Ice Breaker, Ice Queen, Snow Queen, Ice Princess
power.summary: * Cold abilities slow the movement of particles in the target. This slowing causes heat to leave the target. Therefore, cold powers also trigger a rush of hot air to rise from the target swirling wind all around. * Symbol - Bluish White Snowflake * Personality: Cold Elementalist personalities are influenced by their link to Cold. ** Examples: Cold, Icy, Chilly, Severe, Harsh, Brutal, Reserved

specialty.name: Cryomancy
specialty.summary: * Cryo is the magical version of Cold. * Cryo effects can be sustained without a source, but they can also be canceled by counter-magic. * Cryo reacts with Pyro to produce the [Melt] effect. * Cryo reacts with Geo to produce the [Brittle] effect. * Cryo reacts with Hydro to produce the [Freeze] effect. * Cryo reacts with Electro to produce the [Superconduct] effect. * Cryo reacts with Aero to produce the [Chill] effect.

ability.name: Chill
ability.summary: * Damage are Slow

ability.name: Comet
ability.summary: * A massive ball of cold falls from the sky.

ability.name: Control Cold
ability.summary: * [Reaction]: Redirect a cold effect to another target.

ability.name: Frost Weapon
ability.summary: * Add cold damage to normal attack.

ability.name: Ice Armor
ability.titles: Frozen Man, Ice Form, Ice Man Cometh

ability.name: Ice Castle
ability.reference: * The cold never bothered me anyway. - Elsa, Frozen

ability.name: Ice Flow
ability.summary: * A floating block of ice suitable for a raft rises to the water's surface. * [Requires]: May only be cast near water.

ability.name: Ice Riding
ability.summary: * Provides [Skating] ability without the requirement of Skates.

ability.name: Identify Dimension
ability.summary: * Ability to gain knowledge of the current dimension or the home dimension of an object or being from another dimension.

power.name: Earth
power.summary: * Earth is the element of substance. Earth Elementalists must be persistent, stoic, strong and enduring. They must be subbornly immobile in mind and spirit. * Symbol - Brown Mountain

specialty.name: Geomancy
specialty.summary: * Geo is the magical version of Earth. * Geo effects can be sustained without a source, but they can also be canceled by counter-magic. * Geo reacts with Pyro to produce the [Overheat] effect. * Geo reacts with Cryo to produce the [Brittle] effect. * Geo reacts with Hydro to produce the [Quagmire] effect. * Geo reacts with Electro to produce the [Grounded] effect. * Geo reacts with Aero to produce the [Weightess] effect.

ability.name: Buried Alive
ability.reference: * I've done far worse than kill you. I've hurt you. And I wish to go on hurting you. I shall leave you as you left me, as you left her; marooned for all eternity in the center of a dead planet... buried alive! Buried alive...! - Khan, Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
ability.summary: * Collapse earth to close an opening.

ability.name: Control Earth
ability.summary: * [Reaction]: Redirect an earth effect to another target.

ability.name: Earthbind
ability.summary: * Gravity increases for target flying unit. [-1 Altitude] for each success. No effect on units that are not flying.

ability.name: Earth Move
ability.summary: * Pushes a mound of earth like a bulldozer.

ability.name: Earth Sight
ability.summary: * By touching the ground with bare skin, detect any object directly touching the ground in sight range regardless of intervening obstacle. This ability is particularly useful underground, for seeing through walls, and for indirect fire.

ability.name: Earth Till
ability.summary: * Softens earth. Also can prepare earth for planting crops in a large area.

ability.name: Earth Walk
ability.summary: * Ignore movement penalties while travelling over natural earth or stone.

ability.name: Landslide
ability.summary: * Causes a weak section of earth or rock to collapse.

ability.name: Mountain out of a Molehill
ability.summary: * Grow a small pile of earth bigger and bigger.

ability.name: Pass Through Earth
ability.summary: * Allows the user to move through earth as if it were water.

ability.name: Quagmire
ability.summary: * Any unit in the area is must spend double movement when moving.

ability.name: Shatter
ability.summary: * [Attack] - Does no damage to the target, but instead damages its [Armor].

ability.name: Sinkhole
ability.summary: * A prone character on bare earth begins to sink.

ability.name: Solidify
ability.summary: * Any liquified solid become solid again.

ability.name: Stone Form
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Cover body in dust, dirt, or mud. * [Action]: Gain attributes of [Earth] as well as [Earth Walk] for the turn. * [Continue]: May make [Strike] and [Grab] [Earth] [Close Combat] attacks at Level.

ability.name: Treacherous Ground
ability.summary: * Creates a patch of broken earth or rock that will trip anything moving across it at more than a slow walk.

ability.name: Tremor
ability.summary: * Summons a small living earthquake in broken earth or rock. Earth elementals love nothing more than knocking things over.

power.name: Electricity
power.reference: * Lightning is eternal, the world is but shadow. - Raiden Shogun, the Electro Archon, Genshin Impact
power.summary: * Electric Elementalist personalities are influenced by their link to Electricity. * Energetic, Explosive, Dynamic, Animated, Spark of Life, High Strung * Symbol - Yellow Lightning

specialty.name: Electromancy
specialty.summary: * Electro is the magical version of Electricity. * Electro effects can be sustained without a source, but they can also be canceled by counter-magic. * Electro reacts with Pyro to produce the [Overload] effect. * Electro reacts with Cryo to produce the [Superconduct] effect. * Electro reacts with Hydro to produce the [Electrocharged] effect. * Electro reacts with Geo to produce the [Grounded] effect. * Electro reacts with Aero to produce the [Ionized] effect.

ability.name: Arc Lightning
ability.summary: * Lightning leaps from the target to others in range.

ability.name: Call Lightning
ability.summary: * Calls a lightning strike from an existing storm cloud.

ability.name: Control Lightning
ability.summary: * [Reaction]: Redirect a lightning effect to another target.

ability.name: Lightning Warp
ability.summary: * Near instantaneous travel in a flash of lightning. * Level determines distance travelled.

ability.name: Control Energy
ability.summary: * [Reaction]: Redirect an energy effect to another target.

power.name: Fire
power.titles: Arsonist, Fire Lord, Firebomber, Firestarter, Firewalker, Pyrokinetic, Pyromancer, Pyromaniac, Volcanist
power.reference: * Fire. It's a living thing, Brian. It breathes, it eats, and it hates. The only way to beat it is to think like it. To know that this flame will spread this way across the door and up across the ceiling, not because of the physics of flammable liquids, but because it wants to. Some guys on this job, the fire owns them, makes 'em fight it on it's level, but the only way to truly kill it is to love it a little. - Donald Rimgate, Backdraft * Dry is good and wind is better. Count the years you always knew it. Strike a match go on and do it...Oh light the sky and hold on tight, the world is burning down. - Shawn Colvin, Sunny Came Home
power.summary: * Fire is the element of power. Fire Elementalists must have desire, passion, and the energy and drive to achieve it. * Symbol - Red Flame * Passionate, Fiery, Explosive, Incendiary, Violent

specialty.name: Pyromancy
specialty.summary: * Pyro is the magical version of Earth. * Pyro effects can be sustained without a source, but they can also be canceled by counter-magic. * Pyro reacts with Geo to produce the [Overheat] effect. * Pyro reacts with Cryo to produce the [Melt] effect. * Pyro reacts with Hydro to produce the [Vaporize] effect. * Pyro reacts with Electro to produce the [Overload] effect. * Pyro reacts with Aero to produce the [Wildfire] ability.

ability.name: Burning Eyes
ability.summary: * Flaming eyes may see heat.

ability.name: Control Fire
ability.reference: * Pyro - X-Force
ability.summary: * [Action]: Change the shape of fire. * [Reaction]: Redirect a fire effect to another target.

ability.name: Combustion
ability.summary: * Summons a small living flame on combustible material. Fire elementals love nothing more than creating fires.

ability.name: Eternal Flame
ability.summary: * Creates a flame that burns without fuel for as long as desired (only one at a time).

ability.name: Fire Break
ability.summary: * Create an area where fire is smothered (does not effect existing heat).

ability.name: Fire Form
ability.summary: * Body becomes living flame. * [Action]: Gain attributes of [Fire] as well as [Fire Breathing] and [Fire Walk] for the turn. * [Continue]: May make [Strike] and [Grab] [Fire] [Close Combat] attacks at Level.

ability.name: Fire Walk
ability.reference: * I touch the fire and freezes me. I look into it and its black. Why can't I feel? My skin should crack and peel. I want the fire back. Now through the smoke, she calls to me, to make my way across the flame. To save the day or maybe melt away. I guess it's all the same. So I will walk through the fire, cause whereelse can I turn. I will walk through the fire and let it... The torch I bear is scorthing me, and Buffy's laughing I've no doubt. I hope she fries. I'm free if that bitch dies. I'd better help her out. Cause she is drawn to the fire. Some people never learn, and she will walk through the fire and let it... These endless days are finally ending in a blaze. And we are caught in the fire. The point of no return. So we will walk through the fire and let it burn. - Buffy the Vampire Slayer, Once More with Feeling
ability.summary: * Walk through flames. Gain [Armor] vs. Fire and ignore [Burning] effects.

ability.name: Flame Skin
ability.summary: * Immolate body in Fire * [Action]: Gain attributes of [Fire]. * [Continue]: May make [Strike] and [Grab] [Fire] [Close Combat] attacks at Level.

ability.name: Flaming Weapon
ability.titles: Fire Fist, Flame Tongue, Flamebrand, Flaming Arrow, Flaming Sword
ability.summary: * Add the [Fire] trait to a weapon or to unarmed attacks.

ability.name: Pyroclastic Flow
ability.reference: * A fast-moving current of volcanic hot gas and rock, which reaches speeds up to 700 km/h (450 mph). The gas can reach temperatures of about 1,000 C (1,830 F). Pyroclastic flows normally hug the ground and travel downhill, or spread laterally under gravity.

ability.name: Wall of Fire
ability.summary: * Forms a continuous [Wall] of [Fire]. * [Requires]: A flammable fuel must exist for the whole length of the wall.

ability.name: Wildfire
ability.summary: * Air in the area becomes bone dry and overheated. +1 [Fire] or [Air] abilities.

ability.name: Control Force
ability.summary: * [Reaction]: Redirect a force effect to another target.

ability.name: Control Gravity
ability.summary: * [Reaction]: Redirect a gravity effect to another target.

ability.name: Heat Mirage
ability.summary: * Create vague illusions in heated areas. The scale of the illusion is only limited by the size of the heated area.

ability.name: Heat Vision
ability.summary: * May see heat.

ability.name: Control Light
ability.summary: * [Reaction]: Redirect a light effect to another target.

ability.name: Shine Down
ability.reference: * Raiden Shogun, Genshin Impact

ability.name: Control Magnetism
ability.summary: * [Reaction]: Redirect a magnetic effect to another target.

power.name: Sound
power.summary: * Sonic attacks are a form of vibration/explosive attack that generaly does [Concussive Damage]. They also can cause temporary or permanent deafness.

ability.name: Mimicry
ability.summary: * Exactly duplicate sounds you have just heard or committed to memory. At high levels, even modem communication can be duplicated.

ability.name: Control Time
ability.summary: * [Reaction]: Redirect a time effect to another target.

ability.name: Temporal Tracking
ability.summary: * Ability to track a time traveler to his/her destination.

ability.name: Time Stop
ability.summary: * Ability to briefly exit the normal timestream. This effectively freezes time for a few seconds. The user is can move freely, but nothing but air can be moved or harmed. Note that doors cannot be opened and air is thick to move through or breathe.

power.name: Water
power.reference: * Davy Jones Locker * The power of water is its ability to change shape. - Genshin Impact
power.summary: * Adaptable, Adjustable, Easy-going, Empathic, Flexible, Fluid, Patient, Serene, Versatile, Wrathful * Water is the element of change. Water elementalists must be adaptable, fluid, and flexible in their attitude (though not arbitrary). They are generally patient and empathetic, but they are also known for the intensity of their wrath. Their flexiblitity is often reflected in their sexuality. * Symbol - Blue Teardop * Water is the source of life and after Air it is the thing that we need most urgently to survive. Pure, unspoiled water can bestow many amazing benefits and has been the rise and fall of many empires. Of course, water can also be the source of a quick death. * Though Water washes away impurities, it does so by taking them unto itself and Water always remembers.

specialty.name: Hydromancy
specialty.summary: * Hydro is the magical version of Water. * Hydro effects can be sustained without a source, but they can also be canceled by counter-magic. * Hydro reacts with Pyro to produce the [Vaporize] effect. * Hydro reacts with Cryo to produce the [Freeze] effect. * Hydro reacts with Geo to produce the [Quagmire] effect. * Hydro reacts with Electro to produce the [Electrocharged] effect. * Hydro reacts with Aero to produce the [Fog] effect.

ability.name: Control Water
ability.summary: * [Reaction]: Redirect a water effect to another target.

ability.name: Liquify
ability.summary: * Any solid becomes a liquid.

ability.name: Ride the Wave
ability.summary: * Slide on water

ability.name: Scrying Pool
ability.summary: * Look at your reflection in any pool of water, drop something in, and when the ripples recede you may see the current reflection from any other body of water that you have seen your reflection in.

ability.name: Summon Current
ability.summary: * Summons a small living water flow in moving water. Water elementals love nothing more than pushing things around.

ability.name: Tides
ability.summary: * Raise or lower water level.

ability.name: Undertow
ability.summary: * Creates a strong downward current that can suck things downward.

ability.name: Wall of Water
ability.summary: * [Effect]: [Wall] of Water * [Requires]: May only be cast in water. * [Anytime]: Turbulence strikes any surface or underwater unit that crosses it.

ability.name: Water Form
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Douse body in at least a bucket of water. * [Continuous]: May make [Strike] and [Grab] Water Close Combat attacks at Level. Gain attributes of Water as well as [Water Breathing] and [Walk on Water]. [Pierce Resistance], [Slash Resisteance], [Fire Resistance], [Impact Vulnerable], [Heat Vulnerable], [Electric Vulnerable].

ability.name: Water Walk
ability.summary: * Move on or under water as if it were solid ground of any desired slope.

ability.name: Wave
ability.summary: Intensifies existing waves or creates new waves.

ability.name: Disintegrate
ability.summary: * Causes wounds that are difficult to heal * A victim that takes Disintegrate Tokens equal to Body are completely destroyed.

ability.name: Destruction
ability.summary: * Effects only unliving objects * A target that takes Destruction Tokens equal to Body are completely destroyed.

power.name: Transfiguration
power.summary: * The ability to transform others.

ability.name: Malleate
ability.summary: * Make target soft and malleable.

ability.name: Petrification
ability.summary: * [Focus]: vs. Spirit and place [Petrification] counters on the target body location. * Any body location with a [Petrification] is encased in stone. It requires an [Action] to remove a [Petrification]. Any area that suffers 3 [Petrification] turns completely to stone. If any other area is so petrified, then complete petrification immediately spreads across the entire body and then the body and all its gear immediately converts to a stone statue. * Additioan Effects: A petrified arm cannot move. A petrified leg reduces Move by half. A petrified head is unable to see or hear. Other petrifed areas have no additional effect. Petrified Arms or legs can break off like a clean amputation without blood loss. * This ability can also be used to restore a petrified target back to its original form if the skill is at least equal to the original. Lost limbs may also be restored by reattaching the limb before restoration. * This ability can also be used on any sort of earth to harden the earth to equivalent stone.

ability.name: Polymorph
ability.summary: * [Action]: Roll vs. Spirit and place Black [Shapeshift] Tokens on target. * A unit with 0 Spirit due to polymorph changes into any creature desired of equal Body. When the last Shapeshift Token is removed, a polymorphed unit returns to normal.

power.name: Transmutation
power.summary: * The ability to transform non-living matter.

power.name: Primal Force
power.titles: Arch Demon, Arch Fiend, Celestials, Deity, Demigod, Divine Power, Galactus, Godling, Godly, Godlike, Greater Deity, Lesser Deity, Planeswalker, Power Cosmic, Supreme Deity
power.summary: * Primal energy is the most fundamental energy in existence. It is, at once, physical, mental, and spiritual. As the fundamental energy of the cosmos, those that wield it have a special connection to reality and can gain control over certain aspects of reality. * Though Primal is not innately more powerful than other forces, it makes other abilities a great deal more effective.

ability.name: Channel Worship
ability.reference: A god cannot survive as a memory. - Apollo, Star Trek - Who Mourns for Adonais?
ability.summary: * With this ability, the user may use the worship directed toward him, to recover [Primal].

ability.name: Create Artifact
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Spend a [Primal] * [Action]: Create [Skill] worth of artifacts of any sort desired. These are free to maintain on any Plane the user created. They require an additional [Primal] per day when up to [Skill] Artifacts are on any other Plane.

ability.name: Create Servitors
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Spend a [Primal] * [Action]: Create [Skill] worth of creatures of any sort desired. These are free to maintain on any Plane the user created. They require an additional [Primal] per day when up to [Skill] Servitors are on any other Plane. Such Servitors are usually fanatically loyal, though some users do not inspire loyalty.

ability.name: Planescaping
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Spend a [Primal] * [Action]: Create a small Plane (pocket dimension) in the [Etherial Realm] that lasts up to [Level] days. This Plane has a radius of [Skill] x 100 miles. * [Action]: Sustain a previously created Plane for an additional [Level] days. * [Action]: Make a single alteration to a previously create Plane. This alteration may be anything that the user chooses, has a radius of [Skill] miles, and is permanent.

ability.name: Primal Accuracy
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Spend a [Primal] * [Free]: The current [Attack] ignores target [Defense]. It may also be targetted to affect only one type of material.

ability.name: Primal Armor
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Spend a [Primal] * [Free]: For this turn, gain [Armor] equal to [Skill] vs. any type of attack including [Primal Strike].

ability.name: Primal Defense
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Spend a [Primal] * [Free]: For this turn, gain [Defense] equal to [Skill] vs. any type of attack including [Primal Accuracy].

ability.name: Primal Embodiment
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Spend a [Primal] * [Action]: For the next [Skill] turns, the user may use any ability through any willing target.

ability.name: Primal Immortality
ability.summary: * [Passive]: User does not age, does not require food, water or air. User is immune to disease, gases, non-acidic poisons.

ability.name: Primal Immunity
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Spend a [Primal] * [Free]: Enable survival in any environment for the next [Skill] days.

ability.name: Primal Reach
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Spend a [Primal] * [Free]: Another ability has unlimited [Range] with no penalty for distance. This can even apply to [Melee] and [Close Combat].

ability.name: Primal Regeneration
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Spend a [Primal] * [Action]: Immediately remove [Skill] damage tokens of any kind.

ability.name: Primal Reincarnation
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Spend a [Primal] * [Action]: Return from the dead in a new form.

ability.name: Primal Resurrection
ability.reference: * Hmm, my heroic last stands never seem to stick. - Jax, Runeterra
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Spend all [Primal] * [Action]: Return from the dead.

ability.name: Primal Sense
ability.summary: * [Action]: Detect any being with [Primal] or [Primal] used within the area within the last [Skill] days.

ability.name: Primal Strength
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Spend a [Primal] * [Free]: Perform any feat of strength.

ability.name: Primal Strike
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Spend a [Primal] * [Free]: The current [Attack] ignores target [Armor].

ability.name: Primal Transfer
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Spend a [Primal] * [Action]: Target gains a [Primal].

ability.name: Primal Vision
ability.summary: * [Requires]: Spend a [Primal] * [Action]: View any area that is known or the area that a known person occupies.

ability.name: Soul Binding
ability.summary: * Capture a soul that has become separated from its body. This soul can be willing or unwilling. It can then be bound to a body or other form on a Plane created by the user.

ability.name: Sphere of Control
ability.summary: * Sphere of control is an idea, activity, or philosophy with which the user is strongly associated. * Developing a Sphere of Control is difficult, but allows the user to have far reaching powers whenever the Sphere is present. This benefits both the user and his followers.

ability.name: Entanglement
ability.summary: Reduces Movement

power.name: Computer Control
power.summary: Gives ability to control computers like Computer Science.
